snippet: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. We celebrate the life of Bill Cunningham. He brightened New York City by generously sharing his unique perspective during a trailblazing career spanning decades. The Board of Trustees, staff and dancers of Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater 1/3
lead_paragraph: CUNNINGHAM--Bill. We celebrate the life of Bill Cunningham. He brightened New York City by generously sharing his unique perspective during a trailblazing career spanning decades. The Board of Trustees, staff and dancers of Alvin Ailey American Dance Theater 1/3
